title: 12/15/20: Reports - Premiums List per Employee
content: Find all the premiums allocated to your employees in the "Premiums List per Employee" report in Excel format!To do this :In the main menu, click on "Reports" symbolized byÂ ,Go to Report - "Employees"> Premiums List per Employee,In order to refine your search, you can select the Division, the service(s), the department(s), the sub-department(s),Choose the reference date,Click on Report (Excel), the report will automatically download in Excel format to your usual download folder.Each type of premiums is sorted by window in your Excel file:Hourly premiums where you will also find the premium for the position columnCumulative premiumsCumulative personalized bonusesHere is an overview of the report which is downloaded in Excel format in the usual download location defined on your computer:Helpful?00Updated: 4 years ago Share :
